_header: High lord thou hear my boon / That madest middle earth & moon
_description: A prayer of penitence by an old man — 108 lines in alternating 12- and 5-line stanzas

BLHar2253.First Lines:
Heȝe louerd þou here my bone þat madest middelert
                    & mone…
BLHar2253.Last Lines:
…þat we of sontes habben syht ant heuene to
                    mede
